original: intros f l y x H. unfold differentiable_pt_lim. intros eps H_eps. specialize (H eps H_eps). destruct H as [delta H]. exists delta. intros h H_neq H_delta. unfold R_dist. replace (fun u v : R => (f u + v - f x - y * (u - x)) = f u - f x - y * (u - x)) with (fun u v : R => f u - f x - y * (u - x) = v) by reflexivity. apply H.
